channel.title: Running Client
channel.description: So i have the Delta++ source and client, i dont know where the error is coming from but anyways it says Connection error - retrying in 5...4..3..2 and so on and server sided it says Incoming connection from: 127.0.0.1:51586 null disconnected - 127.0.0.1 wtf do i do??

item.title: Running Client
item.dc:creator: @poopoo999 poopoo999
item.description:
@poopoo999 wrote:

So i have the Delta++ source and client, i dont know where the error is coming from but anyways it says Connection error - retrying in 5…4…3…2 and so on and server sided it says
Incoming connection from: 127.0.0.1:51586
null disconnected - 127.0.0.1
wtf do i do??

Read full topic
